rukus.text: 77|41|nihsandeh, aagyaakaaree us din chhaanv tatha jal sroton mein honge.
77|43|khao tatha pio manamaanee un karmon ke badale, jo tum karate rahe.
77|45|vinaash hai us din jhuthalaane vaalon ke lie.
77|46|(he jhuthalaane vaalo!) tum kha lo tatha aanand le lo kuchh[1] din. vaastav mein, tum aparaadhee ho.
77|47|vinaash hai us din jhuthalaane vaalon ke lie.
77|48|jab unase kaha jaata hai ki (allaah ke samaksh) jhuko, to jhukate nahin.
77|49|vinaash hai us din jhuthalaane vaalon ke lie.
77|50|to (ab) ve kis baat par is (quraan) ke pashchaat eemaan[1] laayenge
